meta.title: Page not found | Coriolis Pharma

body.class: error404 wp-embed-responsive wp-theme-coriolis max-w-screen overflow-x-hidden pt-20 has-infographic-banner

div.class: flex flex-col justify-between min-h-screen

header.class: bg-white flex flex-col justify-center fixed h-[80px] top-0 w-full z-[9999]

nav-controls block lg:hidden

div.class: min-h-[60vh] flex flex-col justify-center items-center
infographic-banner bg-[#ECFCFC] border border-[#008EA4] mx-auto mb-8 pt-[35px] lg:pt-0 relative rounded-[10px]
lg:bg-[#ECFCFC] px-8 lg:py-12 md:pl-16 rounded-t-[10px]

div.h2: Driving Success from Preclinical to Commercial Approval & Beyond

div.class: lg:bg-[#16475C] mb-[150px] lg:mb-0 xl:mb-0 px-8 lg:py-12 md:pl-16 rounded-b-[10px]

p.class: text-[#102F47] lg:text-white text-[16px] lg:text-[24px] mb-6 leading-[140%] lg:leading-[120%] max-w-[560px]

div.p: A guide for early and late-stage development, commercialization, and lifecycle management

a.class: bg-[#102F47] lg:bg-[#EFEFED] text-white lg:text-[#16475C] px-8 py-2 rounded-lg font-regular text-[15px] hover:bg-[#e8e8e8] transition-colors duration-200 inline-block

footer.class: bg-main-dark-blue text-white px-6 md:px-10 py-8 md:py-16 text-sm

div.class: footer_info px-10 py-10 rounded-10 border-1 border-white-500/50 hidden lg:block
